content.rendered:
Directed by Ravi Udyawar.

Written by Girish Kohli. Girish Kohli. Girish Kohli. Ravi Udyawar. Kona Venkat.

Cast Abhinay Raj Singh(Business son). Sridevi(Devki Sabarwal (as Sridevi Kapoor)). Sajal Ali(Aarya Sabarwal (as Sajal Aly)). Akshaye Khanna(Mathew Francis). Adnan Siddiqui(Anand Sabarwal). Nawazuddin Siddiqui(Detective Dayashankar Kapoor (D. K.)). Abhimanyu Singh(Joginder ‘Jagan’ Singh). Pitobash(Guard Baburam Pandey (as Pitobash Tripathy)). Vikas Verma(Charles Deewan). Adarsh Gourav(Mohit Chadha (as Adarsh Gourav Bhagvatula)). Riva Arora(Piyaa ‘Piyu’ Sabarwal). Yuvraj Singh Bajwa(Cop (as Yuvraj Bajwa)). Aayush Agarwal(Rishi (as Aayush Agarwal)). Joy Badlani(Ravi). Sakshi Bhatia(News reader). Triptii Dimri(Aarya’s Classmate (as Tripti Dimri)). Premnath Gulati(Judge). Saiba Kapoor(DK’s Daughter).Mohammad Khalkhalian. Suparna Moitra(Indu (as Suparna Krishna)). Suman Patel(Mrs. Pandey (Baburam’s wife)). Umair Patel(Musical Artist (archive sound)). Vara Raturi(Sapna). Ivan Rodrigues(School Principal). B Shantanu(Mr. Rathod (as B. Shantanu)). Rajeev Sharma(Inspector Devendra Rana)

Language Hindi.

Producers Sanjay Bector. Ashish Dixit. Boney Kapoor. Rishikesh Laxmikant. Kapil Madnani. Jairaj Parayan. Yogiraj Shetty. Ajay R. Yadav.
